articles.description: Follow live text, BBC TV coverage, radio commentary, reaction and updates from the Winter Olympics in Milan-Cortina.

articles.description: England face Scotland in the ICC T20 World Cup in Kolkata - follow live scores, radio commentary and video highlights.

articles.description: England come in with all the momentum. Scotland arrive chastened. But the recent history of Test rugby's oldest fixture will take some escaping.
articles.title: Scotland v England: Visitors can mint new era in Six Nations tie

articles.description: Matt Weston cements his status as the best skeleton racer in the world as he makes history by winning Olympic gold in emphatic fashion in Cortina, securing Team GB’s first medal of the 2026 Winter Games.
articles.title: Matt Weston: Skeleton pilot wins emphatic Olympic gold for first medal GB medal of games

articles.description: Chelsea striker Liam Delap turns in "top" performance in the 4-0 win over Hull City with a hat-trick of assists after missing a sitter.
articles.title: Hull City 0-4 Chelsea: Liam Delap misses sitter but assists three goals in FA Cup

articles.description: Newcastle United captain Bruno Guimaraes is expected to be out for a couple of months after sustaining a hamstring injury.
articles.title: Newcastle: Bruno Guimaraes set to be out for two months with injury

articles.description: Two sailors are in hospital after a "catastrophic" crash between the New Zealand and France boats on the opening day of the New Zealand Sail Grand Prix in Auckland.
articles.title: SailGP: Two sailors in stable condition after New Zealand crash with France

articles.description: When the men's rinks of Canada and Sweden met at the Winter Olympics in Cortina on Friday, tempers became frayed.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Canada & Sweden in curling row

articles.description: Portugal manager Roberto Martinez sits down with Kelly Somers to talk about his life in football.
articles.title: Roberto Martinez on FA Cup win with Wigan, managing Cristiano Ronaldo and Belgium

articles.description: BBC Sport F1 correspondent Andrew Benson assesses what we learnt  - and what we didn't - from the first pre-season test in Bahrain.
articles.title: F1 testing: What did we learn about the new cars?
